Text:
Aslamu-Alaikum,

I hope you are well brother. I just wanted to say thank you for uploading this beautifull Book of Allah Az Wa-Jall, Al-Qur'an.  May Allah Subhanhu Wa-Ta'Allah bless you and your family with good health, forgive your sins and help you in your hour of need.

Jazak'Allah Khair
Pakistani Dragon

Wa-Alaikum-Aslam.
